laboratory_examinations.findings: Strong positive reaction on hours 48, 72, and 96 for cefadroxil in both white petrolatum and water; both placebos negative. Controls were all negative.
Mean wheal diameter was 10 mm with autologous serum and 2 mm with 0.9% saline.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Response was abolished with pretreatment using ketotifen; dermatographism on the forearm did not change.
